(ph)_template_unique.desc: (ph) skill has random rolled stat against enemies with static stat and keyword.
(ph)_template_unique.full: (PH) {c_important}Skill{/c} has {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} random rolled Stat against enemies with {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} static Stat and {c_important}{u}Keyword{/u}{/c}.

100000_steps.desc: when activating or refreshing the full walking arsenal key passive effect, you automatically cast ground stomp and gain fury. can only occur once every seconds.
100000_steps.full: When activating or refreshing the full {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} Key Passive effect, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.

ahavarion_spear_of_lycander.desc: gain a random shrine effect for seconds after killing an elite enemy. can only occur once every seconds.
ahavarion_spear_of_lycander.full: Gain a random Shrine effect for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

airidahs_inexorable_will.desc: when casting an ultimate skill and again seconds after, you pull in distant enemies and deal physical damage to them. this damage is increased by per point of willpower you have. current bonus
airidahs_inexorable_will.full:
When casting an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill and again {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by {c_number}[(Affix_Value_2 * 100)|2%x|]{/c} per {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} point of Willpower you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor(Owner.Willpower_Total) * (Affix_Value_2 * 100) / Affix."Static Value 2"|x%|]{/c}

ancients_oath.desc: steel grasp launches additional chains. enemies hit by steel grasp take increased damage from you for seconds.
ancients_oath.full: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

andariels_visage.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to trigger a poison nova that applies poisoning damage over seconds to enemies in the area.
andariels_visage.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that applies {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to enemies in the area.

arreats_bearing.desc: ancients you summon are empowered. korlic creates an earthquake that deals physical damage over seconds when he leaps. talic leaves behind dust devils that deal damage while he whirlwinds. mawdac ignites the ground burning enemies for an additional damage over seconds when he upheaves the ground.
arreats_bearing.full:
Ancients you summon are empowered.

{icon:bullet}Korlic creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} that deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds when he leaps.
{icon:bullet}Talic leaves behind {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (Affix_Value_1 * 2)]{/c} damage while he whirlwinds.
{icon:bullet}Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (Affix_Value_1)]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when he upheaves the ground.

ashearas_khanjar.desc: hits with this weapon increase your attack speed by for seconds, up to .
ashearas_khanjar.full: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|1%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%+|]{/c}.

axial_conduit.desc: chain lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to enemies. when it returns, it drains mana from you for each active chain lightning. after draining total mana, the bolt explodes for lightning damage. chain lightning expires if you dont have enough mana for it to drain.
axial_conduit.full:
{c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} enemies. When it returns, it drains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana from you for each active {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c}. After draining {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} total Mana, the bolt explodes for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Lightning Damage.
                       
{c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.

azurewrath.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to freeze enemies for seconds and deal cold damage to them

band_of_first_breath.desc: casting evade consumes stacks of resolve to generate vigor. gain armored hides passive effect.
band_of_first_breath.full:
Casting {c_important}Evade{/c} consumes {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} |4stack:stacks; of {c_important}{u}Resolve{/u}{/c} to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Vigor.

Gain {c_important}Armored Hide's{/c} Passive Effect.

banished_lords_talisman.desc: after you spend of your primary resource, your next core skill is guaranteed to overpower. your critical strikes that overpower deal increased damage.
banished_lords_talisman.full: After you spend {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} of your Primary Resource, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}. Your Critical Strikes that {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

battle_trance.desc: increase frenzys maximum stacks by . while at maximum stacks, you deal increased damage and your other skills gain increased attack speed.
battle_trance.full: Increase {c_important}Frenzy's{/c} maximum stacks by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c}. While at maximum stacks, you deal  {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and your other Skills gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.

beastfall_boots.desc: when you cast an ultimate skill, your next core skill consumes all of your energy and deals increased damage per energy consumed. using a cooldown restores energy.
beastfall_boots.full:
When you cast an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill consumes all of your Energy and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2%x|]{/c} increased damage per Energy consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Energy.

björnfangs_tusks_(not_used_we_reuse_for_.desc: cataclysms lightning strikes now prioritize enemies. while cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited spirit and deal increased damage.
björnfangs_tusks_(not_used_we_reuse_for_.full:
{c_important}Cataclysm{/c}'s lightning strikes now prioritize enemies.

While {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

black_river.desc: corpse explosion consumes up to additional corpses around the initial corpse, gaining damage and size per additional corpse consumed.
black_river.full: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} damage and {c_random}[Affix_Value_2*2|1%|]{/c} Size per additional Corpse consumed.

blood_artisans_cuirass.desc: when you pick up blood orbs, a free bone spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current life percent.
blood_artisans_cuirass.full: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

blood_moon_breeches.desc: your minions attacks have a chance to randomly inflict decrepify or iron maiden. you deal increased overpower damage to enemies affected by your curses.
blood_moon_breeches.full:
Your Minions' attacks have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance to randomly inflict {c_important}Decrepify{/c} or {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.  

You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} increased {c_important}Overpower{/c} damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Curses{/c}.

bloodless_scream.desc: your darkness skills chill enemies for up to and deal increased damage to frozen enemies. lucky hit your darkness skills have up to a chance to generate additional essence against frozen targets.
bloodless_scream.full:
Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills {c_important}{u}Chill{/u}{/c} enemies for up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} and deal {c_random}[(Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 2") - Affix."Static Value 3"|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} additional Essence against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} targets.

blue_rose.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to form an exploding ice spike, dealing cold damage. triple this chance if the enemy is frozen.
blue_rose.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to form an exploding {c_important}Ice Spike{/c}, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c}.

boost_dagger.desc: this is a test item used for max level boosts.
boost_dagger.full: This is a test item used for max level boosts.

boost_helm.desc: this is a test item used for max level boosts.
boost_helm.full: This is a test item used for max level boosts.

boost_pants.desc: this is a test item used for max level boosts.
boost_pants.full: This is a test item used for max level boosts.

boost_scythe.desc: this is a test item used for max level boosts.
boost_scythe.full: This is a test item used for max level boosts.

condemnation.desc: your core skills deal increased damage when spending combo points. your basic skills using this weapon have a chance to generate combo points.
condemnation.full: Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage when spending {c_number}3{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}. Your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills using this weapon have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}3{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}.

cowl_of_the_nameless.desc: you gain increased lucky hit chance against crowd controlled enemies.
cowl_of_the_nameless.full: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.

craze_of_the_dead_god.desc: when you would take direct damage, it is instead distributed as poisoning over the next seconds but increased by . lucky hit direct damage has up to a chance based on your poisoned life percentage to infect an enemy with touch of death.
craze_of_the_dead_god.full:
When you would take direct damage, it is instead distributed as Poisoning over the next {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds but increased by {c_random}[(Affix_Value_1*100-100)|%|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Direct damage has up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2*100|%|]{/c} chance based on your Poisoned Life percentage to infect an enemy with {c_important}Touch of Death{/c}.

crown_of_lucion.desc: each time you use a skill with a resource Cost, gain increased damage and resource cost is increased by for seconds, stacking up to times.

cruors_embrace.desc: casting blood surge consumes nearby corpses to cause mini novas, dealing damage. this damage is increased by for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to , as well as by for each corpse consumed.
cruors_embrace.full: Casting {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage. This damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c}, as well as by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%x|]{/c} for each Corpse consumed.

deathless_visage.desc: bone spear leaves behind echoes that explode for physical damage, increased by for every critical strike damage you have. current bonus
deathless_visage.full:
{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} leaves behind echoes that explode for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage, increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor((Owner.(ComputeCritDamageScalar() + (-1)) + Owner.Crit_Damage_Percent) / (Affix."Static Value 1" / 100)) * Affix."Static Value 0"|x%||1|]{/c}

deathspeakers_pendant.desc: blood surge casts a mini nova on your minions, dealing damage. damage is increased by per target drained by the initial cast, up to .
deathspeakers_pendant.full: {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage. Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.

dolmen_stone.desc: casting boulder while hurricane is active causes the boulder to rotate around you instead. boulders damage is increased by for each one currently rotating. you may have up to boulders active at a time.
dolmen_stone.full:
Casting {c_important}Boulder{/c} while {c_important}Hurricane{/c} is active causes the {c_important}Boulder{/c} to rotate around you instead. {c_important}Boulder's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%x|]{/c} for each one currently rotating.

You may have up to {c_number}10{/c} {c_important}Boulders{/c} active at a time.

doombringer.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to deal shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by for seconds.
doombringer.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

eaglehorn.desc: penetrating shot makes enemies vulnerable for seconds. every th cast of penetrating shot bounces off walls and deals more damage.
eaglehorn.full:
{c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. 

Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]th{/c} cast of {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} bounces off walls and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more damage.

earthbreaker.desc: casts of landslide leave behind tectonic spikes that deal physical damage over seconds. spawning a landslide pillar within tectonic spikes has a chance to spawn two instead.
earthbreaker.full:
Casts of {c_important}Landslide{/c} leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Spawning a {c_important}Landslide{/c} pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2 * 100|%|]{/c} chance to spawn two instead.

ebonpiercer.desc: blight also shoots smaller projectiles that pierce enemies and deal shadow damage over seconds.
ebonpiercer.full: {c_important}Blight{/c} also shoots {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} smaller projectiles that pierce enemies and deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

endurant_faith.desc: when you would be damaged for at least of your maximum life at once it is instead

esadoras_overflowing_cameo.desc: upon collecting crackling energy, theres a chance to release a lightning nova, dealing lightning damage, increased by for every intelligence you have. current bonus
esadoras_overflowing_cameo.full:
Upon collecting {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}, there's a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release a lightning nova, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage, increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} Intelligence you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor(Owner.Intelligence_Total / Affix."Static Value 2") * Affix."Static Value 1"|x%|]{/c}

esus_heirloom.desc: your critical strike chance is increased by of your movement speed bonus. current bonus
esus_heirloom.full:
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Movement Speed bonus.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[(Min(Owner.Movement_Scalar_Capped_Total,2)-1) * (Affix_Value_1)|1%|]{/c}

eyes_in_the_dark.desc: death trap deals increased damage and will re-arm itself a second time.

fields_of_crimson.desc: while using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with rupture creates a blood pool that inflicts bleeding damage over seconds. enemies standing in the pool take increased damage.
fields_of_crimson.full: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

fists_of_fate.desc: your attacks randomly deal to of their normal damage.
fists_of_fate.full: Your attacks randomly deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of their normal damage.

flamescar.desc: while channeling incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing fire damage.
flamescar.full: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.

flameweaver.desc: casting fire bolt through your firewall causes it to split into bolts, each dealing increased damage.
flameweaver.full: Casting {c_important}Fire Bolt{/c} through your {c_important}Firewall{/c} causes it to split into {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} bolts, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

fleshrender.desc: casting a defensive skill deals damage to nearby poisoned enemies, increased by for every willpower you have. current bonus
fleshrender.full:
Casting a {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skill deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Willpower you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor(Owner.Willpower_Total / Affix."Static Value 0") * Affix."Static Value 1"|x%|]{/c}

flickerstep.desc: each enemy you evade through reduces your active ultimate cooldown by seconds, up to seconds.
flickerstep.full: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

fractured_winterglass.desc: casting frozen orb has a chance to spawn a random conjuration when it explodes. lucky hit your conjurations have up to a chance to launch a frozen orb at nearby enemies.
fractured_winterglass.full:
Casting {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a random {c_important}Conjuration{/c} when it explodes.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Conjurations{/c} have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to launch a {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} at Nearby enemies.

frostburn.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to freeze enemies for seconds.
frostburn.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Freeze{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

gloves_of_the_illuminator.desc: fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals of normal damage.
gloves_of_the_illuminator.full: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.

godslayer_crown.desc: when you stun, freeze, or immobilize an elite, you pull in all nearby enemies and deal increased damage to them for seconds. can only occur once every seconds. against bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.
godslayer_crown.full:
When you Stun, {c_important}{u}Freeze{/u}{/c}, or Immobilize an Elite, you Pull In all Nearby enemies and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage to them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

Against Bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.

gohrs_devastating_grips.desc: whirlwind explodes every seconds and after it ends, dealing of the base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as fire damage.
gohrs_devastating_grips.full: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} explodes every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and after it ends, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.

grasp_of_shadow.desc: lucky hit damaging an enemy with a marksman or cutthroat skill has up to a chance to summon a shadow clone that mimics that skill.
grasp_of_shadow.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Marksman{/c} or {c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon a {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} that mimics that Skill.

greatstaff_of_the_crone.desc: claw is now also a storm skill and also casts storm strike at normal damage.
greatstaff_of_the_crone.full: {c_important}Claw{/c} is now also a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill and also casts {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} at {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage.

greaves_of_the_empty_tomb.desc: sever leaves behind desecrated ground that deals shadow damage over seconds.
greaves_of_the_empty_tomb.full: {c_important}Sever{/c} leaves behind {c_important}Desecrated Ground{/c} that deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

harlequin_crest.desc: gain damage reduction. in addition, gain ranks to all skills.
harlequin_crest.full: Gain {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction. In addition, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Ranks to all Skills.

harmony_of_ebewaka.desc: according to your secondary spirit hall choice, your skills are all additionally jaguar, eagle, gorilla, or centipede skills. your skills deal increased damage per spirit type they have.
harmony_of_ebewaka.full:
According to your secondary Spirit Hall choice, your Skills are all additionally {c_important}Jaguar{/c}, {c_important}Eagle{/c}, {c_important}Gorilla{/c}, or {c_important}Centipede{/c} Skills.

Your Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage per Spirit type they have.

heir_of_perdition.desc: succumb to hatred and earn mothers favor, increasing your damage dealt by . slaughter enemies to briefly steal mothers favor from nearby allies.
heir_of_perdition.full: Succumb to hatred and earn Mother's Favor, increasing your damage dealt by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}. Slaughter enemies to briefly steal Mother's Favor from Nearby allies.

hellhammer.desc: upheaval ignites the ground burning enemies for an additional damage over seconds increased by for every strength you have. current bonus
hellhammer.full:
{c_important}Upheaval{/c} ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2" * 100|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Strength you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor(Owner.Strength_Total / Affix."Static Value 1") * Affix."Static Value 2" * 100|x%|]{/c}

howl_from_below.desc: instead of detonating immediately, corpse explosion summons a volatile skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. corpse explosions damage is increased by .
howl_from_below.full: Instead of detonating immediately, {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. {c_important}Corpse Explosion's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.

hunters_zenith.desc: every seconds you spend in an animal form, your next core skill is guaranteed to overpower and critically strike, and deals increased damage. casting a shapeshifting skill reduces this timer by second, or seconds if it changes you to a new animal form.
hunters_zenith.full:
Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds you spend in an animal form, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} and Critically Strike, and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Casting a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill reduces this timer by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} second, or {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" + Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds if it changes you to a new animal form.

iceheart_brais.desc: enemies that die while frozen have a chance to unleash a frost nova.
iceheart_brais.full: Enemies that die while {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to unleash a {c_important}Frost Nova{/c}.

insatiable_fury.desc: werebear form is now your true form, and you gain ranks to all werebear skills.
insatiable_fury.full: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Ranks to all {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills.

jacinth_shell.desc: spending vigor heals you for of your maximum life. every second, your active cooldowns each drain maximum life from you to reduce their durations by seconds.
jacinth_shell.full:
Spending Vigor Heals you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life. 

Every second, your active Cooldowns each drain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life from you to reduce their durations by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

lidless_wall.desc: lucky hit while you have an active bone storm, hitting an enemy outside of a bone storm has up to a chance to spawn an additional bone storm at their location. each of your active sacrifice bonuses increases this chance by and the maximum possible bone storms by .
lidless_wall.full:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} While you have an active {c_important}Bone Storm{/c}, hitting an enemy outside of a {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} at their location. 

Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increases this chance by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} and the maximum possible {c_important}Bone Storms{/c} by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~|]{/c}.

locrans_talisman.desc: your skills gain a critical strike chance bonus

loyaltys_mantle.desc: while your spirit hall choices match their bonuses are more potent. skills of their base spirit gain vigor cost reduction. skills of their base spirit gain cooldown reduction.
loyaltys_mantle.full:
While your Spirit Hall choices match:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Their bonuses are {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} more potent.
{icon:bullet,1.2} Skills of their Base Spirit gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Vigor Cost Reduction.
{icon:bullet,1.2} Skills of their Base Spirit gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Cooldown Reduction.

mad_wolfs_glee.desc: werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain ranks to all werewolf skills.
mad_wolfs_glee.full: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Ranks to all {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills.

melted_heart_of_selig.desc: gain maximum resource. when taking damage, is drained as resource for every of maximum life you would have lost.
melted_heart_of_selig.full:
Gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Maximum Resource.

When taking damage, {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} is drained as {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of Maximum Life you would have lost.

mjölnic_ryng.desc: while cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited spirit and deal increased damage.
mjölnic_ryng.full: While {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

mothers_embrace.desc: if a core skill hits or more enemies, of the resource cost is refunded.
mothers_embrace.full: If a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill hits {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more enemies, {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Resource cost is refunded.

mutilator_plate.desc: you are blood lanced, and when blood lance would deal damage to you, it instead fortifies you for of your maximum life and has a chance to form a blood orb. blood lance deals increased damage.
mutilator_plate.full:
You are {c_important}Blood Lanced{/c}, and when {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} would deal damage to you, it instead {c_important}{u}Fortifies{/u}{/c} you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life and has a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.

{c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

nesekem_the_herald.desc: every seconds, you randomly mark a nearby enemy. marked enemies are vulnerable, and your attacks against them are guaranteed to critically strike and overpower. hitting a marked enemy times clears the mark from them.
nesekem_the_herald.full:
Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, you randomly mark a Nearby enemy. Marked enemies are {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}, and your attacks against them are guaranteed to Critically Strike and {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.

Hitting a marked enemy {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} times clears the mark from them.

overkill.desc: death blow creates a shockwave, dealing of its base damage to enemies. enemies who die to this effect also reset death blows cooldown.
overkill.full: {c_important}Death Blow{/c} creates a shockwave, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset {c_important}Death Blow’s{/c} Cooldown.

paingorgers_gauntlets.desc: damaging enemies with a nonbasic skill cast marks them for seconds. when a basic skill first hits a marked enemy, the basic skills damage is echoed to all marked enemies, dealing increased damage.
paingorgers_gauntlets.full: Damaging enemies with a Non-{c_important}Basic{/c} Skill cast marks them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. When a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill first hits a marked enemy, the {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill's damage is echoed to all marked enemies, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

path_of_tragoul.desc: bone prison traps a larger area and fires bone splinters at enemies trapped within. increase your maximum essence by for seconds each time these bone splinters hit an enemy.
path_of_tragoul.full:
{c_important}Bone Prison{/c} traps a larger area and fires {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} at enemies trapped within. 

Increase your Maximum Essence by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds each time these {c_important}Bone Splinters{/c} hit an enemy.

peacemongers_signet.desc: while you have at least stacks of ferocity, you gain vigor per second. gaining ferocity also grants resolve.
peacemongers_signet.full:
While you have at least {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} stacks of {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c}, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Vigor per second.

Gaining {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} also grants {c_important}{u}Resolve{/u}{/c}.

penitent_greaves.desc: you leave behind a trail of frost that chills enemies. you deal more damage to chilled enemies.
penitent_greaves.full: You leave behind a trail of frost that {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies. You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more damage to {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} enemies.

protection_of_the_prime.desc: while moving, you gain dodge chance. after standing still for seconds, you become unstoppable until you move.
protection_of_the_prime.full:
While moving, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} Dodge Chance.

After standing still for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, you become {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} until you move.

rage_of_harrogath.desc: lucky hit inflicting bleeding on an enemy has up to a chance to reduce the cooldowns of your skills by second.
rage_of_harrogath.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Inflicting Bleeding on an enemy has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your Skills by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} second.

raiment_of_the_infinite.desc: after using teleport, close enemies are pulled to you and stunned for seconds, but teleports cooldown is increased by .
raiment_of_the_infinite.full: After using {c_important}Teleport{/c}, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds, but {c_important}Teleport's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.

rakanoths_wake.desc: when you cast a skill with a cooldown you explode dealing fire damage

ramaladnis_magnum_opus.desc: skills using this weapon deal increased damage per point of fury you have, but you lose fury every second.
ramaladnis_magnum_opus.full: Skills using this weapon deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|2%x|]{/c} increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury every second.

razorplate.desc: thorns has a chance to deal increased damage.
razorplate.full: Thorns has a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

ring_of_mendeln.desc: every th attack from each minion is empowered, exploding for physical damage.
ring_of_mendeln.full: Every {c_number}6th{/c} attack from each Minion is empowered, exploding for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.

ring_of_misfortune.desc: lucky hit up to a chance to lose all of your resource

ring_of_red_furor.desc: after spending fury within seconds, your next cast of hammer of the ancients, upheaval, or death blow within seconds is a guaranteed critical strike and deals bonus critical strike damage.
ring_of_red_furor.full: After spending {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} Fury within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, your next cast of {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c}, {c_important}Upheaval{/c}, or {c_important}Death Blow{/c} within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds is a guaranteed Critical Strike and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike Damage.

ring_of_starless_skies.desc: spending your primary resource reduces the resource cost of your skills and increases your damage by for seconds, up to .
ring_of_starless_skies.full: Spending your Primary Resource reduces the Resource cost of your Skills and increases your damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 2"|%x|]{/c}.

ring_of_the_midday_hunt.desc: your maximum vigor is increased by , and killing an enemy grants you vigor. while you have ferocity, your poisoning effects deal their damage across of the normal duration.
ring_of_the_midday_hunt.full:
Your Maximum Vigor is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0" * 100|%|]{/c}, and killing an enemy grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Vigor. 

While you have {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c}, your Poisoning effects deal their damage across {c_number}[(1-(1/(1+Affix."Static Value 1"))) * 100|%|]{/c} of the normal duration.

ring_of_the_midnight_sun.desc: when you critically strike, you regain of the vigor youve spent in the last seconds. gain counterattacks passive effect.
ring_of_the_midnight_sun.full:
When you Critically Strike, you regain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%+|]{/c} of the Vigor you've spent in the last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Gain {c_important}Counterattack's{/c} Passive Effect.

ring_of_the_ravenous.desc: rends duration is increased by seconds. damaging enemies with your brawling skills applies stacks of rends bleed. this can only affect each enemy once every second.
ring_of_the_ravenous.full:
{c_important}Rend's{/c} duration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds. 

Damaging enemies with your {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skills applies {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} stacks of {c_important}Rend's{/c} Bleed. This can only affect each enemy once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} second.

ring_of_the_sacrilegious_soul.desc: you automatically activate the following equipped skills on corpses around you raise skeleton every seconds. corpse explosion every seconds. corpse tendrils every seconds.
ring_of_the_sacrilegious_soul.full:
You automatically activate the following equipped Skills on Corpses around you:
{icon:bullet}{c_important}Raise Skeleton{/c} every {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
{icon:bullet}{c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} every {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
{icon:bullet}{c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} every {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|1|]{/c} seconds.

ring_of_writhing_moon.desc: a pestilent swarm spawns from you every seconds, dealing poison damage per hit. your pestilent swarms now orbit around you and generate vigor per hit.
ring_of_writhing_moon.full:
A {c_important}Pestilent Swarm{/c} spawns from you every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage per hit. 

Your {c_important}Pestilent Swarms{/c} now orbit around you and generate {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Vigor per hit.

rod_of_kepeleke.desc: your core skills are now additionally basic skills and free to cast, but deal up to reduced damage based on their vigor cost. when cast at maximum vigor, your core skills consume all vigor to return to full damage, cast at their largest size, and become guaranteed critical strikes, with increased critical strike damage for each point of vigor spent this way.
rod_of_kepeleke.full:
Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills are now additionally {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills and free to cast, but deal up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"*100|%|]{/c} reduced damage based on their Vigor Cost. 

When cast at Maximum Vigor, your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills consume all Vigor to return to full damage, cast at their largest Size, and become guaranteed Critical Strikes, with {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%2x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage for each point of Vigor spent this way.

saboteurs_signet.desc: casting a core skill has a chance to throw stun grenades that deal physical damage and stun enemies for seconds. your stun grenades gain lucky hit chance.
saboteurs_signet.full:
Casting a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to throw {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"||]{/c} |4second:seconds;.

Your {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} {c_label}Lucky Hit{/c} Chance.

scorn_of_the_earth.desc: your evade is now soar. soar deals increased damage.
scorn_of_the_earth.full:
Your {c_important}Evade{/c} is now {c_important}Soar{/c}.

{c_important}Soar{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

scoundrels_kiss.desc: rapid fire now lobs exploding arrows that deal increased damage.
scoundrels_kiss.full: {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} now lobs exploding arrows that deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

scoundrels_leathers.desc: while you have unlimited energy from inner sight, casting a core skill has a chance to spawn caltrops, poison trap, or death trap.
scoundrels_leathers.full: While you have unlimited Energy from {c_important}Inner Sight{/c}, casting a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn {c_important}Caltrops{/c}, {c_important}Poison Trap{/c}, or {c_important}Death Trap{/c}.

sepazontec.desc: your basic skills deal increased damage and always use their rd attack. every rd cast of a basic skill strikes three times.
sepazontec.full:
Your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and always use their {c_number}3rd{/c} attack. 

Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill strikes three times.

shard_of_verathiel.desc: basic skills deal increased damage but additionally cost primary resource

shattered_vow.desc: enemies afflicted by more damage over time than remaining life are executed.
shattered_vow.full: Enemies afflicted by more Damage over Time than remaining Life are Executed.

shroud_of_false_death.desc: if you havent dealt damage in the last seconds, gain stealth and movement speed.
shroud_of_false_death.full: If you haven't dealt damage in the last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, gain {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} and {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed.

shroud_of_khanduras.desc: casting dark shroud makes you immune for seconds, but your evade cooldown is increased by seconds. evading while dark shroud is active leaves behind an explosion that deals shadow damage and pulls in enemies.
shroud_of_khanduras.full:
Casting {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} makes you {c_important}{u}Immune{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, but your {c_important}Evade{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Evading{/c} while {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} is active leaves behind an explosion that deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage and Pulls In enemies.

skyhunter.desc: the first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed critical strike. when you consume stacks of precision casting a skill, that skill gains increased critical strike damage and you gain energy.
skyhunter.full: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. When you consume stacks of {c_important}Precision{/c} casting a Skill, that Skill gains {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage and you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} {c_important}Energy{/c}.

soulbrand.desc: your healing potion no longer heals instantly and instead grants a barrier for of the original healing for seconds. you gain damage reduction while you have a barrier and may drink your healing potion while at full life.
soulbrand.full:
Your Healing Potion no longer heals instantly and instead grants a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of the original healing for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. 

You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction while you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} and may drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.

staff_of_endless_rage.desc: every rd cast of fireball launches additional projectiles and deals increased damage.
staff_of_endless_rage.full: Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional projectiles and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

staff_of_lam_esen.desc: your casts of charged bolts have a chance to be attracted to enemies and last longer.
staff_of_lam_esen.full: Your casts of {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance to be attracted to enemies and last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} longer.

starfall_coronet.desc: meteors mana cost is replaced with a second cooldown and total charges. casting meteor drops additional meteors around the target. its enchantment and enhancement drop additional meteor instead.
starfall_coronet.full:
{c_important}Meteor's{/c} Mana cost is replaced with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} second Cooldown and {c_number}[1+Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} total Charges. 

Casting {c_important}Meteor{/c} drops {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} additional {c_important}Meteors{/c} around the target. Its {c_important}Enchantment{/c} and {c_important}Enhancement{/c} drop {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} additional {c_important}Meteor{/c} instead.

storms_companion.desc: your wolf companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing lightning damage and gaining the storm howl ability.
storms_companion.full: Your {c_important}Wolf{/c} Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the {c_important}Storm Howl{/c} ability.

tal_rashas_iridescent_loop.desc: casting a pyromancy, shock, or frost skill increases your damage by for seconds, stacking once per element. casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different element.
tal_rashas_iridescent_loop.full: Casting a {c_important}Pyromancy{/c}, {c_important}Shock{/c}, or {c_important}Frost{/c} Skill increases your damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, stacking once per element. Casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different Element.

tassets_of_the_dawning_sky.desc: when you take damage from a nonphysical damage type, you gain maximum resistance to that damage type for seconds. this effect can only apply to one damage type at a time.
tassets_of_the_dawning_sky.full: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1+%|]{/c} Maximum Resistance to that damage type for {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_0"]{/c} seconds. This effect can only apply to one damage type at a time.

temerity.desc: effects that heal you beyond life grant you a barrier up to of your maximum life that lasts for seconds. you may now drink your healing potion while at full life.
temerity.full:
Effects that Heal you beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life grant you a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. 

You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.

tempest_roar.desc: lucky hit storm skills have up to a chance to grant spirit. your base storm skills are now also werewolf skills.
tempest_roar.full:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.

Your base {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills.

the_basilisk.desc: when you first hit an enemy with an earth skill petrify them for seconds

the_butchers_cleaver.desc: lucky hit critically striking an enemy has up to a chance to fear and slow them by for seconds.
the_butchers_cleaver.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critically Striking an enemy has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to Fear and Slow them by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

the_grandfather.desc: increases your critical strike damage by . the other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
the_grandfather.full: Increases your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}. The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.

the_mortacrux.desc: when consuming a corpse there is a chance to also create a decaying

the_oculus.desc: gain the effect of the teleport enchantment for free. when you evade using teleport enchantment you are taken to a random location.
the_oculus.full: Gain the effect of the {c_important}Teleport Enchantment{/c} for free. When you Evade using {c_important}Teleport Enchantment{/c} you are taken to a random location.

the_third_blade.desc: your weapon mastery skills are now also core skills that have no cooldowns but

the_umbracrux.desc: your subterfuge skills create an attackable shade totem for seconds

the_unmaker.desc: soulrifts duration is increased by seconds for every essence you spend while its active, up to seconds. soulrift deals of its shadow damage per second to surrounding enemies for every essence you gain while its active.
the_unmaker.full:
{c_important}Soulrift's{/c} duration is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|1|]{/c} seconds for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Essence you spend while it's active, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} seconds. 

{c_important}Soulrift{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its Shadow damage per second to surrounding enemies for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Essence you gain while its active.

tibaults_will.desc: you deal increased damage while unstoppable and for seconds after. when you become unstoppable, gain of your primary resource.
tibaults_will.full: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage while {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} and for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds after. When you become {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c}, gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} of your Primary Resource.

tuskhelm_of_joritz_the_mighty.desc: when you gain berserking while already berserk, you have a chance to become more enraged granting increased damage, fury per second, and cooldown reduction.
tuskhelm_of_joritz_the_mighty.full: When you gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} while already {c_important}{u}Berserk{/u}{/c}, you have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to become more enraged granting {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_0"|%x|]{/c} increased damage, {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_1"]{/c} Fury per second, and {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_2"|%|]{/c} Cooldown Reduction.

twin_strikes.desc: after casting double swing times, your next double swing will hit additional times, each dealing increased damage.
twin_strikes.full: After casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0" - 1]{/c} times, your next {c_important}Double Swing{/c} will hit {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} additional times, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

tyraels_might.desc: while at full life, your skills unleash a divine barrage dealing damage.
tyraels_might.full: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage.

ugly_bastard_helm.desc: casting wrath of the berserker causes you to explode, dealing fire damage. while berserking, your direct damage dealt is converted into fire. you deal increased fire damage.
ugly_bastard_helm.full:
Casting {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} causes you to explode, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Fire damage. While {u}{c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}{/u}, your direct damage dealt is converted into Fire. 

You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Fire damage.

unbroken_chain.desc: casting steel grasp reduces iron maelstroms cooldown by seconds. enemies damaged by iron maelstrom deal less damage for seconds.
unbroken_chain.full:
Casting {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} reduces {c_important}Iron Maelstrom's{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1/3|1|]{/c} seconds. 

Enemies damaged by {c_important}Iron Maelstrom{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.

unsung_ascetics_wraps.desc: lightning storm gains additional strike each times it grows. lightning storm critical strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing increased damage.
unsung_ascetics_wraps.full:
{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} gains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional strike each times it grows.

{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|x%|]{/c} increased damage.

vasilys_prayer.desc: your earth skills are now also werebear skills and fortify you for of your maximum health.
vasilys_prayer.full: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills and {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Health.

vox_omnium.desc: casting a core skill additionally fire instances of fire bolt frost bolt or spark

waxing_gibbous.desc: killing an enemy with shred grants stealth for seconds. breaking stealth with an attack grants guaranteed critical strikes for seconds.
waxing_gibbous.full: Killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.

wildheart_hunger.desc: shapeshifting into a new animal form increases the value of your bestial rampage bonuses by , up to . this bonus decays by per second.
wildheart_hunger.full: {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} into a new animal form increases the value of your {c_important}Bestial Rampage{/c} bonuses by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c}, up to {c_random}[(Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0")|1%+|]{/c}. This bonus decays by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} per second.

windforce.desc: hits of barrage have a chance to deal double damage and knock down enemies.
windforce.full: Hits of {c_important}Barrage{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage and Knock Down enemies.

word_of_hakan.desc: your rain of arrows is always imbued with all imbuements and receives your arrow storm benefits.
word_of_hakan.full: Your {c_important}Rain of Arrows{/c} is always {c_important}Imbued{/c} with all {c_important}Imbuements{/c} and receives your {c_important}Arrow Storm{/c} benefits.

wound_drinker.desc: every time you deal thorns damage, you gain vigor. gain toxic skins passive effect.
wound_drinker.full:
Every time you deal Thorns damage, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Vigor.

Gain {c_important}Toxic Skin's{/c} Passive Effect.

writhing_band_of_trickery.desc: casting a subterfuge skill leaves behind a decoy trap that continuously taunts and lures enemies. after seconds, it explodes, dealing shadow damage. this effect is treated as a trap skill and can only spawn one decoy trap every seconds.
writhing_band_of_trickery.full:
Casting a {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} Skill leaves behind a {c_important}Decoy Trap{/c} that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. After {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, it explodes, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage. 

This effect is treated as a {c_important}Trap{/c} Skill and can only spawn one {c_important}Decoy Trap{/c} every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

wushe_nak_pa.desc: casting an ultimate skill grants or amplifies its matching primary spirit hall bonus with potency for seconds. your ultimate skills each gain an additional skill type the seeker is a focus skill. the hunter is a mobility skill. the devourer is a potency skill. the protector is a defensive skill.
wushe_nak_pa.full:
Casting an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill grants or amplifies its matching Primary Spirit Hall Bonus with {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%+|]{/c} potency for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills each gain an additional Skill Type:
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_important}The Seeker{/c} is a {c_important}Focus{/c} Skill.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_important}The Hunter{/c} is a {c_important}Mobility{/c} Skill.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_important}The Devourer{/c} is a {c_important}Potency{/c} Skill.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_important}The Protector{/c} is a {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skill.

xfals_corroded_signet.desc: lucky hit your damage over time effects have up to a chance to erupt, dealing damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.
xfals_corroded_signet.full: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your damage over time effects have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to erupt, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.

yens_blessing.desc: casting a skill has a chance to cast a nonmobility, nonultimate skill that is currently on cooldown. can only occur once every seconds.
yens_blessing.full: Casting a Skill has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to cast a Non-{c_important}Mobility{/c}, Non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
